custom.eclipse: .fab > a > .icon {color:white!important} .fab > a {background:#f77d2c!important} .md .navbar-inner { background-color: #f77d2c!important } i.icon, .searchbar-disable-button, .back {color: #f77d2c!important} .navbar-inner > * > .link > i.md-only.icon {color:white!important} .ios .icon-back {background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHZpZXdCb3g9IjAgMCAxMiAyMCI+PHBhdGggZD0iTTEwLDBsMiwybC04LDhsOCw4bC0yLDJMMCwxMEwxMCwweiIgZmlsbD0iI2Y3N2QyYyIvPjwvc3ZnPg==')!important} .md .color-theme-red .toggle input[type=checkbox]:checked+.toggle-icon:after {background: #f77d2c!important} .md .color-theme-red .toggle input[type=checkbox]:checked+.toggle-icon {background: rgba(247, 125, 44, 0.5)!important} .ios .toggle input[type=checkbox]:checked+.toggle-icon {background: #f77d2c!important}
custom.igba: a[onclick="document.cookie = 'cacheKey=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC;'; location.reload();"], .modal-button, .searchbar-cancel {color: #f77d2c!important} .item-link.list-button {color: #f77d2c} .f7-icons, .icon {color: #f77d2c!important} .content-block-inner {background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #FABE61, #F76B1C)!important;} .label-switch input[type='checkbox']:checked + .checkbox {background-color: #f77d2c!important} i.icon.icon-back {background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0iaHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmciIHZpZXdCb3g9IjAgMCAxMiAyMCI+PHBhdGggZD0iTTEwLDBsMiwybC04LDhsOCw4bC0yLDJMMCwxMEwxMCwweiIgZmlsbD0iI2Y3N2QyYyIvPjwvc3ZnPg==')!important} .button-big[style='box-shadow: 0 5px 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); border:none; background-image: linear-gradient(#5a3deb 0%, #45419d 100%); font-weight:bold;'], .button-big[style='box-shadow: 0 5px 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); border:none; background-image: linear-gradient(-227deg, #FABE61 0%, #F76B1C 100%); font-weight:bold;'], .button-big[style='box-shadow: 0 5px 13px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1); border:none; background-image: linear-gradient(-227deg, #5a3deb 0%, #45419d 100%); font-weight:bold;'] {background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #FABE61, #F76B1C)!important;color:white!important} .content-block-inner h3 {color: #FFF}
